actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to amend the State Department Basic Authorities Act of 1956 to establish within the Department of State an Under Secretary of State for Security.

summary.text: Amends the State Department Basic Authorities Act of 1956 to establish in the Department of State an Under Secretary of State for Security. Directs the Secretary of State to report to specified congressional committees on the responsibilities assigned to the Under Secretary.

titles.title: A bill to amend the State Department Basic Authorities Act of 1956 to establish within the Department of State an Under Secretary of State for Security.
